A train can be taken in Florence or Rome to Chiusi Chianciano Terme Station. Then you can take a taxi to Bagni San Filippo

Spas of Bagni San Filippo are hot springs which are small and have the presence of calcium deposits, which form white concretions of calcium carbonate, such as the one shown above. There are also beautiful waterfalls.

value: General view of Bagni San Filippo, with characteristic Tuscan cypresses in the foreground

content=Small houses for rent.  Surrounded by a beautiful park with swimming pool, each of the small houses feature a kitchen/dine and a double bedroom with en suit bathroom/shower. In your front door garden you will find a table with sunshade, sun beds/deck chair and a barbecue.
